message.raw:
Merge sensors and physics in one lib to avoid circular dependencies

Merge sensors and physics library into one gazebo_physics_sensors
since both are using symbols from each other. This way we avoid
circular link dependencies.

See #!/osrf/gazebo/issue/1516 for detailed
information.
